website_summaries.verdict: Based on most reviews, the Sperry Striper II Baja CVO delivers a top-notch comfort that lasts all day. Built with high-quality materials, the sneaker is priced surprisingly low, enticing shoppers to collect pairs in every available colorway. Its stylishly slim silhouette reportedly gathered heaps of compliments, which flattered a couple of wearers.However, several users brought up some concerns involving the rawhide laces fraying too quickly and the sneaker’s narrow sizing. But these issues seemed minor as this sneaker still comes out as a highly recommended pair.
pros: The Sperry Striper II Baja CVO is very budget friendly
Its splendid comfort has earned solid praises from the majority of reviewers
The cushioned footbed impressed a couple of workers as it allowed them to wear the shoe all day without hurting their feet
Some shoppers were so pleased with their initial purchase and ended up buying more pairs in different colorways
Several users remarked that the shoe is well-made and durable
Quite a lot liked the shoe’s laidback look that fits the summer season
A handful of wearers received compliments while wearing the shoe
One of them experienced what seemed to him a “compliment overload.”
The shoe fits true to size, as per most comments
cons: A couple of users complained that the rawhide laces frayed after a week’s use
At least one user felt that the shoe runs slightly narrow

customer_reviews.title: "Lose the leather laces."
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful. I'm wearing them right now. A word to the manufacturer - "Lose the leather laces." (Altho they deserve them... What I saying is that they are incredibly sturdy and the laces just bothered me; they made it difficult to actually LACE them. Once I got rid of them and put in regular laces - they were/are fabulous! (I'm not Gay - this is just the way I talk!) ;];]
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and finish for inexpensive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear with shorts and am very pleased so far. Comfortable right out of the box even with bare feet.. Socks with shorts is a fail in my book! Found a casual belt - ITIEZY men's canvas - that is a fairly close match color wise and style wise and inexpensive. Seem well put together especially for such a reasonable price. As usual with Amazon pricing algorithm the price varies from hour to hour and day to day. I normally wear an 11 but from previous experience with Sperry I went up a half size to 11.5 and that was perfect length
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but bad quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking shoes but they don’t last very long. I just bought these shoes to wear after work during a business trip to Europe for 10 days. After 7 days of wearing it when casually going out have worn the heels so much that the sole from the heels is coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: dax

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and fits well. I have wide feet and these shoes were actually pretty comfortable. The down side is that like any sneaker, arch support is limited and I wouldn't recommend wearing these for long walks or for running. They look stylish and go well with black or blue jeans.
customer_reviews.author: IATFalcon

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These look great with some chinos for work or shorts for leisure. The leather laces really match up well with some khakis and a brown belt. I have the blue and the green (so far)
customer_reviews.author: keenan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love them - very comfortable, cushioned sole. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Dont think twice, just do it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, not for longer wear just like any flat bottom shoes. Compliment overload, everywhere I go people compliment the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Vish S.

customer_reviews.title: Great every day shoe
customer_reviews.text: My HS son loves these, wears them almost every day. Comfortable and durable. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sperry shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He loves them and is very fond of the Sperry brand. They fit great, he loves wearing them when he goes out with friends. He says they're comfortable and I think they look great with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: GulfCoast Livin

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and fit but laces fray
customer_reviews.text: Good look and fit. Comfortable. However, the laces are soft leather and fraying as you tie. Leaves specks of leather on the shoe. Not the end of the world and I will keep them, but a minor nuisance nonetheless. Would have had a higher score otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and look of these shoes. Bought them for a fall beach vacation and the went great with both shorts and jeans. Did need to stretch backs a couple of times but after thst they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ivanofoz

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe for going out instead of sneakers. I walked in them most of the day expecting my feet would bother me by the end of the day but they were great.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Very good color and conformable
customer_reviews.text: I ware size 10 in other Sperry's shoes I had to get 10 1/2 in these!! I Like them, I will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere Near as Comfortable as the Sperry Striper Series
customer_reviews.text: I thought this shoes was essentially the same product as the Stripper, but no its not. Its not built as well nor as comfortable. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Sperry - great quality, fit  everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, we sprayed some stain protector on them and let it dry for 2 hours to keep them in better shape. Canvas / linen material. Great fit! Stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Sperry's for years now and am never disappointed. They always fit right and a durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Wakem

customer_reviews.title: All Around Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great Sperrys and looks awesome for the boat and casino life. So comfortable that you could wear them all day. Very durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional wear
customer_reviews.text: Used for nearly 4-5 months (3-4 times monthly). It looks great but not a comfortable option for longer durations.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Sperry Topsiders. A great shoe for the office place and for casual usage.
customer_reviews.author: A Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summertime shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect summertime lace up casual shoe. Nice clean casual look.
customer_reviews.author: Michaol Lucka

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes. I love the color and the fit. Classic Sperry Boat shoes perfect for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Drew SC

customer_reviews.title: Great value in a great-looking sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve walked 24 miles since first putting them on three days ago. Very comfortable and they look great. I couldn’t have done that in a pair of Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe and fits good!
customer_reviews.text: Sperry makes great shoes and are fashionable and comfortable. The Baja Sneaker follows this trend and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Comfortable and good looking. The traction is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: They run a little big if you are use to US size and like other comment said, the color is not 100% beige but it's more greenish with beige which is not as advertaised. But overall they are confortable and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Lara

customer_reviews.title: Casual but nice
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son, he likes the shoe
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Fair price. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived quickly and packaged well. They were a gift for my son and I am pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Taimi McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He wears an 11. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hooth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: This show is amazing. Been wearing sperry’s For years and this by far my favorite pair. So many compliments on it as well
customer_reviews.author: Michael Strano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of the best buy i ever made. Great look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Abaroa

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes with good fit just poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: The problem with the shoes is the left one crackles every time I take a step. Something about the construction in the middle of the shoe is not right. The crackling is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking deck sneaker that's flexible and comfortable to wear the entire day. Sperry comes through again.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pair of shoes. However, I usually wear a 10, and these 10s were easy long enough to be a 10.5 or 11. I recommend ordering a half size down of your usual, especially because they’ll be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Get a 0.5 size smaller than your normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10.5 in Vans and they fit perfect, but I wear a 10.0 in Sperry’s. A lot of reviews say to get a 0.5 size smaller than your normal size. That is very correct.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe been a sperry fan for awhile, hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Laces were undone looked like shoes had been worked prior
customer_reviews.author: jack b.

customer_reviews.title: Look good and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and are very comfortable. I enjoy every step.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Squires

customer_reviews.title: I love the leather laces.
customer_reviews.text: My son wares them almost every day. Very affordable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: eva polony

product_meta.title: Sperry Men's Striper II CVO Baja Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Sperry® Striper II CVO Baja sneaker has a laid-back look that is ready to keep you in style all season long with its slim silhouette, breathable woven construction, and intense traction. Breathable woven canvas upper. Traditional lace-up system with sturdy metal eyelets and genuine rawhide laces for a secure fit. Vulcanized construction provides a secure bond between upper and outsole. Soft textile lining for added interior comfort. Removable, cushioned footbed molds to the foot for superior support and comfort. Flexible, lightweight, and non-marking rubber outsole with Razor-Cut Wave-Siping™ for the ultimate traction on wet and dry surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width M (D). Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Materials Breathable woven canvas with genuine rawhide laces for relaxed, everyday cool
Comfort Ultra lightweight, flexible outsole Full-length contoured footbed molds to every foot, and is fully removable
Traction Molded Razor-Cut Wave-Siping design on non-marking rubber outsoles won't scuff floors but gives you sure footing, from boat deck to back deck
